description: Example collection for Impact Mapping methodology

examples.name: SaaS Revenue Growth
highlights: Clear financial goal with specific MRR target
Multiple actor types (free users, paid customers, sales team)

examples.name: Customer Support Efficiency
highlights: Dual goal: reduce costs while maintaining satisfaction
Internal team actors (support agents, content team)

examples.name: Marketplace Launch
highlights: Complex trust, safety, and regulatory considerations

examples.name: Mobile App Engagement
highlights: User lifecycle stages as actors (new, casual, active, power, lapsed)

choosingAnExample.startWithSimple: Use basic-example.json to understand the methodology
choosingAnExample.matchIndustry: Choose example closest to your industry or use case
choosingAnExample.adaptNotCopy: Use examples as inspiration, not templates - your context is unique

actorTypes.primary: Direct users who interact with your product/service
actorTypes.secondary: Influencers, internal teams, partners who indirectly impact goal

prioritizationFramework.mustHave: Critical path to goal, highest impact

adaptationTips: Start with your specific, measurable goal
Identify all actors who can help or hinder the goal
For each actor, define 2-5 behavioral impacts
Brainstorm multiple deliverable options per impact
Flag assumptions early - they guide validation
Sequence into milestones with validation experiments

withSpecDriven.flow: Impact Map → Prioritized Deliverables → Spec-Driven Development
withSpecDriven.example: Use marketplace-example.json deliverables as input to spec-driven methodology
withSpecDriven.benefit: Strategic alignment from goal to implementation

withExampleMapping.flow: Impact Map → Deliverable Selection → Example Mapping → BDD
withExampleMapping.example: Take 'Advanced analytics dashboard' deliverable and run Example Mapping

withHypothesisDriven.flow: Impact Map Assumptions → Hypothesis-Driven Development → Validation
withHypothesisDriven.example: Test critical assumptions from mobile-app-example.json before building
withHypothesisDriven.benefit: Validate before investing in full implementation

withGSD.flow: Impact Map Roadmap → GSD Phase Planning → Execution
withGSD.example: Use roadmap phases as input to GSD phase discussion and planning
